com.andrew.productcatalogue2.search

Class ProductSearchCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andrew.productcatalogue2.search.ProductSearchCriteria

  • public class ProductSearchCriteria
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds various values regarding product search parameters that users request when searching for products. A ProductSearchCriteria instance is passed as a parameter in the findProducts method in ProductService.

    Getters and setters are available for all fields.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProductSearchCriteria.SearchBy
      Indicates whether to search by title or by id
